name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.
name.caption: Name
name.name: name

string.description: The host of the Mongo server.
string.caption: Host
string.name: host

integer.description: The port of the Mongo server.
integer.caption: Port
integer.name: port

string.description: The database name of the Mongo server.
string.caption: Database
string.name: database

mode.modeLabel: Find one object using query map
Find one file using query map
Get file content using query map

globalRef.description: Specify which configuration to use for this invocation.
globalRef.caption: Config Reference
globalRef.name: config-ref

group.caption: General
group.description: Lists names of collections available at this database.

group.caption: General
group.description: Answers if a collection exists given its name.

string.description: The name of the collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Deletes a collection and all the objects it contains. If the collection doesnot exist, does nothing.

string.description: The name of the collection to drop.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Creates a new collection. If the collection already exists, a MongoExceptionwill be thrown.

string.description: The name of the collection to create.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

boolean.description: If the collection will be capped.
boolean.caption: Capped
boolean.name: capped

integer.description: The maximum number of documents the new collection is able to contain.
integer.caption: Max Objects
integer.name: maxObjects

integer.description: The maximum size of the new collection.
integer.caption: Size
integer.name: size

group.caption: General
group.description: Inserts an object in a collection, setting its id if necessary.

string.description: The name of the collection where to insert the given object.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Inserts an object in a collection, setting its id if necessary.A shallow conversion into DBObject is performed - that is, no conversion isperformed to its values.

string.description: The name of the collection where to insert the given object.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: Alternative way of specifying the element as a literal Map inside a Mule Flow.
childElement.caption: Element Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/element-attributes

group.caption: General
group.description: Updates objects that matches the given query. If parameter multi is set tofalse, only the first document matching it will be updated. Otherwise, all thedocuments matching it will be updated.

string.description: The name of the collection to update.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

boolean.description: If the database should create the element if it does not exist.
boolean.caption: Upsert
boolean.name: upsert

boolean.description: If all or just the first object matching the query will be updated.
boolean.caption: Multi
boolean.name: multi

group.caption: General
group.description: Updates objects that matches the given query. If parameter multi is set tofalse, only the first document matching it will be updated. Otherwise, all thedocuments matching it will be updated.

string.description: The name of the collection to update.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

boolean.description: If the database should create the element if it does not exist.
boolean.caption: Upsert
boolean.name: upsert

boolean.description: If all or just the first object matching the query will be updated.
boolean.caption: Multi
boolean.name: multi

childElement.description: The query object used to detect the element to update.
childElement.caption: Query Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/query-attributes

childElement.description: The mandatory object that will replace that one which matches the query.
childElement.caption: Element Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/element-attributes

group.caption: General
group.description: Inserts or updates an object based on its object _id.

string.description: The collection where to insert the object.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Inserts or updates an object based on its object _id.

string.description: The collection where to insert the object.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Removes all the objects that match the a given optional query. If query is notspecified, all objects are removed. However, please notice that this isnormally less performant that dropping the collection and creating it and itsindices again.

string.description: The collection whose elements will be removed.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Removes all the objects that match the a given optional query. If query is notspecified, all objects are removed. However, please notice that this isnormally less performant that dropping the collection and creating it and itsindices again.

string.description: The collection whose elements will be removed.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: The query object. Objects that match it will be removed.
childElement.caption: Query Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/query-attributes

group.caption: General
group.description: Transforms a collection into a collection of aggregated groups, by applying asupplied element-mapping function to each element, that transforms each oneinto a key-value pair, grouping the resulting pairs by key, and finallyreducing values in each group applying a suppling 'reduce' function.Each supplied function is coded in JavaScript.Note that the correct way of writing those functions may not be obvious;please consult MongoDB documentation for writing them.

string.description: The name of the collection to map and reduce.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

string.description: A JavaScript encoded mapping function.
string.caption: Map Function
string.name: mapFunction

string.description: A JavaScript encoded reducing function.
string.caption: Reduce Function
string.name: reduceFunction

string.description: The name of the output collection to write the results, replacing previous collection if existed, mandatory when results may be larger than 16MB. If outputCollection is unspecified, the computation is performed in-memory and not persisted.
string.caption: Output Collection
string.name: outputCollection

group.caption: General
group.description: Counts the number of objects that match the given query. If no query ispassed, returns the number of elements in the collection.

string.description: The target collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Counts the number of objects that match the given query. If no query ispassed, returns the number of elements in the collection.

string.description: The target collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: The optional query for counting objects. Only objects matching it will be counted. If unspecified, all objects are counted.
childElement.caption: Query Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/query-attributes

string.description: Alternative way of passing fields as a literal List.
string.caption: Fields
string.name: field

group.caption: General
group.description: Finds all objects that match a given query. If no query is specified, allobjects of the collection are retrieved. If no fields object is specified, allfields are retrieved.

string.description: The target collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: Alternative way of passing fields as a literal List.
childElement.caption: Fields
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/fields

group.caption: General
group.description: Finds all objects that match a given query. If no query is specified, allobjects of the collection are retrieved. If no fields object is specified, allfields are retrieved.

string.description: The target collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: The optional query object. If unspecified, all documents are returned.
childElement.caption: Query Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/query-attributes

childElement.description: Alternative way of passing fields as a literal List.
childElement.caption: Fields
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/fields

group.caption: General
group.description: Finds the first object that matches a given query. Throws a if no one matches the given query.

string.description: The target collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: Alternative way of passing fields as a literal List.
childElement.caption: Fields
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/fields

group.caption: General
group.description: Finds the first object that matches a given query. Throws a if no one matches the given query.

string.description: The target collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

childElement.description: The mandatory query object that the returned object matches.
childElement.caption: Query Attributes
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/query-attributes

childElement.description: Alternative way of passing fields as a literal List.
childElement.caption: Fields
childElement.name: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mongo/fields

group.caption: General
group.description: Creates a new index.

string.description: The name of the collection where the index will be created.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

string.description: The name of the field which will be indexed.
string.caption: Field
string.name: field

group.caption: General
group.description: Drops an existing index.

string.description: The name of the collection where the index is.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

string.description: The name of the index to drop.
string.caption: Index
string.name: index

group.caption: General
group.description: List existent indices in a collection.

string.description: The name of the collection.
string.caption: Collection
string.name: collection

group.caption: General
group.description: Creates a new GridFSFile in the database, saving the given content, filename,contentType, and extraData, and answers it.

string.description: The mandatory name of new file.
string.caption: Filename
string.name: filename

string.description: The optional content type of the new file.
string.caption: Content Type
string.name: contentType

group.caption: General
group.description: Lists all the files that match the given query.

group.caption: General
group.description: Lists all the files that match the given query.

group.caption: General
group.description: Answers the first file that matches the given query. If no object matches it,a MongoException is thrown.

group.caption: General
group.description: Answers the first file that matches the given query. If no object matches it,a MongoException is thrown.

group.caption: General
group.description: Answers an inputstream to the contents of the first file that matches thegiven query. If no object matches it, a MongoException is thrown.

group.caption: General
group.description: Answers an inputstream to the contents of the first file that matches thegiven queryAttributes. If no object matches it, a MongoException is thrown.

group.caption: General
group.description: Lists all the files that match the given query, sorting them by filename. Ifno query is specified, all files are listed.

group.caption: General
group.description: Lists all the files that match the given query, sorting them by filename. Ifno query is specified, all files are listed.

group.caption: General
group.description: Removes all the files that match the given query. If no query is specified,all files are removed.

group.caption: General
group.description: Removes all the files that match the given query. If no query is specified,all files are removed.
